body: @iharsh234: Sure, please go ahead. You are welcome to extend this to only the examples or only pathod for now.

issue.title: Extend mypy example/simple (#2194)

repository.name: mitmproxy
repository.description: An interactive TLS-capable intercepting HTTP proxy for penetration testers and software developers.

issue.body:
Extended mypy checking to `example/simple`.
I am new to mypy , thats why worked on small part once get reviewed and get most of it , I will be updating whole` example/ `.
REF : #2194

issue.title: Mypy Checking to pathod

repository.name: mitmproxy
repository.description: An interactive TLS-capable intercepting HTTP proxy for penetration testers and software developers.

issue.body:
This PR Extend Mypy checking to `/pathod` folder , fixed some bugs from previous` example/simple `and add these mypy checking to `tox`.
REF #2194 , #2221

rename.from: Extend mypy checking to cover pathod, tests and examples

body:
Hi,
When I was working on this I noticed that `examples/complex/xss_scanner.py` contains many errors. Some of those errors are calling `decode()` attribute on `str` tyoe. Can I edit the code as well?

I am not able to understand why there is a difference when we are talking about XSS and SQL

https://github.com/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/blob/6dd336fcec6dc32c4986b6c20189bf1b2132153c/examples/complex/xss_scanner.py#L168-L184

And in the test file as well, this has been done 

https://github.com/mitmproxy/mitmproxy/blob/6dd336fcec6dc32c4986b6c20189bf1b2132153c/test/examples/test_xss_scanner.py#L331-L350
The XSS scanner example was contributed by @ddworken in #1907 - I don't think any of us is deeply familiar with the example in this case, sorry.
Aah okay, I will wait for @ddworken to reply
